33  enum State {
34  Moving,
35  RequestPlanning,
36  ExecutingPlanning,

42  struct auxiliar_calibration {
43  int arduino_min;
44  int arduino_max;
45  int ssc_min;
46  int ssc_max;
47  int ssc_pin;
48  std::string joint_name;
49  double joint_lower;
50  double joint_upper;
51  };

110  public:
111  PlaybackActionServer() : _server(_nh, "/pumpkin/playback_action", false), _aux_vec(32), _loop(1000) {
112  _server.registerGoalCallback(boost::bind(&PlaybackActionServer::onGoal, this));
113  _server.registerPreemptCallback(boost::bind(&PlaybackActionServer::onPreempt, this));
114 
115  _planner_client = _nh.serviceClient<Planner::Request, Planner::Response>("/pumpkin/planner");
116 
117  _ssc = _nh.advertise<SSCMoveList>("/move_ssc_topic", 32);
118  _joints = _nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/playback_joint_states", 1024);
119  //_direct = true;
120  _planner_client.waitForExistence();
121 
122  ROS_INFO("Planner started.");
123 
124  _joint_state.name = std::vector<std::string>(32);
125  _joint_state.position = std::vector<double>(32);
126 
127  _server.start();
128  }
129 
130  ~PlaybackActionServer() {
131  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
132  _server.shutdown();
133  }

138  void onGoal();
139 
143  void onPreempt();
144 
149  void step() {
150  if (!_server.isActive()) {
151  _loop.sleep();
152  return;
153  }
154 
155  switch (_state) {
156  case Moving:
157  move();
158  break;
159  case RequestPlanning:
160  prepare();
161  break;
162  case ExecutingPlanning:
163  change();
164  break;
165  }
166  }
167 
168  void calibrate(int arduino_pin, int arduino_min, int arduino_max, int ssc_min, int ssc_max, int ssc_pin,
169  const std::string &joint_name, double joint_lower, double joint_upper);
170 
171 
172  void endCalibrate(double rate);
173 
174  };
175 
176  void PlaybackActionServer::loadFile() {
177  _movement = std::move(YAML::LoadAllFromFile(_movement_files[_movement_index]));
178  _percentage_step = (double) 100 / _movement.size();
179  _step_it = std::begin(_movement);
180  _end_it = std::end(_movement);
181 
182  _feedback.percentage = 0.0;
183  _feedback.movement_index = _movement_index << 1;
184  }
185 
186  void PlaybackActionServer::move() {
187 
188  if (_step_it->IsNull()) {
189  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::BadFile);
190  _server.setAborted(_result);
191  _step_it = _end_it;
192  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
193  return;
194  } else if ((*_step_it)["an_read"].IsNull()) {
195  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::BadFile);
196  _server.setAborted(_result);
197  _step_it = _end_it;
198 
199  //if (_direct)
200  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
201  return;
202  }
203 
204  std::vector<uint16_t> reads;
205  SSCMoveList command;
206  command.list.reserve(32);
207 
208  //ROS_INFO("New step.");
209 
210  reads = std::move((*_step_it)["an_read"].as<std::vector<uint16_t> >());
211 
212  ++_step_it;
213 
214  double position;
215  for (int i = 0; i < reads.size(); ++i) {
216  SSCMove move;
217  const auxiliar_calibration &aux = _aux_vec[i];
218  move.channel = aux.ssc_pin;
219  if (aux.arduino_max - aux.arduino_min <= 0) {
220  //ROS_WARN("Arduino calibration error");
221  continue;
222  } else {
223  move.pulse = (uint16_t) ((reads[i] - aux.arduino_min) * (aux.ssc_max - aux.ssc_min)
224  / (aux.arduino_max - aux.arduino_min) + aux.ssc_min);
225  if (move.pulse > aux.ssc_max) {
226  ROS_WARN("Pulse overflow: %d", int(move.pulse));
227  move.pulse = aux.ssc_max;
228  } else if (move.pulse < aux.ssc_min) {
229  ROS_WARN("Pulse underflow: %d", int(move.pulse));
230  move.pulse = aux.ssc_min;
231  }
232 
233  position = (reads[i] - aux.arduino_min) * (aux.joint_upper - aux.joint_lower)
234  / (aux.arduino_max - aux.arduino_min) + aux.joint_lower;
235 
236  if (position > aux.joint_upper) {
237  ROS_WARN("Pulse overflow.");
238  position = aux.joint_upper;
239  } else if (position < aux.joint_lower) {
240  ROS_WARN("Pulse underflow.");
241  position = aux.joint_lower;
242  }
243 
244  _joint_state.position[i] = position;
245  }
246  move.speed = 0;
247  command.list.emplace_back(std::move(move));
248  }
249  command.time = 0;
250 
251  _joints.publish(_joint_state);
252  if (command.list.size()) {
253  _ssc.publish(command);
254  } else {
255  ROS_WARN("Outbound error!");
256  }
257 
258  _feedback.percentage += _percentage_step;
259  _feedback.movement_index = _movement_index << 1;
260  _server.publishFeedback(_feedback);
261 
262  if (_step_it == _end_it) {
263  ++_movement_index;
264  _state = RequestPlanning;
265  } else {
266  _loop.sleep();
267  }
268  }
269 
270  void PlaybackActionServer::prepare() {
271  if (_movement_index == _movement_files.size()) {
272  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::OK);
273  _server.setSucceeded(_result);
274  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
275  return;
276  }
277  std::vector<uint16_t> reads;
278  _planner.request.initial_positions.clear();
279  _planner.request.final_positions.clear();
280  _planner.response.joint_trajectory.clear();
281 
282  reads = std::move(_movement.back()["an_read"].as<std::vector<uint16_t> >());
283 
284  double value;
285  for (int i = 0; i < reads.size(); ++i) {
286  auxiliar_calibration &aux = _aux_vec[i];
287 
288  //ROS_INFO("%d", reads[i]);
289 
290  if (aux.arduino_max == aux.arduino_min)
291  continue;
292 
293 
294  value = (reads[i] - aux.arduino_min) * (aux.joint_upper - aux.joint_lower)
295  / (aux.arduino_max - aux.arduino_min) + aux.joint_lower;
296  if (value > aux.joint_upper) {
297  ROS_WARN("Pulse overflow.");
298  value = aux.joint_upper;
299  } else if (value < aux.joint_lower) {
300  ROS_WARN("Pulse underflow.");
301  value = aux.joint_lower;
302  }
303 
304  _planner.request.initial_positions.push_back(value);
305  }
306 
307  loadFile();
308 
309  reads.clear(); //Much probably unecessary, but, just for sure
310  reads = std::move((*_step_it)["an_read"].as<std::vector<uint16_t> >());
311 
312  for (int i = 0; i < reads.size(); ++i) {
313  auxiliar_calibration &aux = _aux_vec[i];
314 
315  if (aux.arduino_max == aux.arduino_min)
316  continue;
317 
318 
319  value = (reads[i] - aux.arduino_min) * (aux.joint_upper - aux.joint_lower)
320  / (aux.arduino_max - aux.arduino_min) + aux.joint_lower;
321  if (value > aux.joint_upper) {
322  ROS_WARN("Pulse overflow: %lf", value);
323  value = aux.joint_upper;
324  } else if (value < aux.joint_lower) {
325  ROS_WARN("Pulse underflow: %lf", value);
326  value = aux.joint_lower;
327  }
328 
329  //_joint_state.position[i] = value;
330  _planner.request.final_positions.push_back(value);
331  }
332 
333  //_joints.publish(_joint_state);
334  ROS_WARN("Starting request plan");
335  if (!_planner_client.call(_planner)) {
336  ROS_FATAL("COULD NOT CALL PLANNER SERVICE.");
337  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
338  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::BadFile);//Has to change here for a new code
339  _server.setAborted(_result);
340  _state = Moving;
341  return;
342  }
343  _plan_index = 0;
344  _state = ExecutingPlanning;
345  //_last_delta = ros::Duration(0);
346  _loop = ros::Rate(_rate / 10);
347  try {
348  ROS_INFO("Planned with %d movements.", (int) _planner.response.joint_trajectory.at(0).points.size());
349  } catch (std::exception &ex) {
350  ROS_FATAL("Error obtaining the response trajectory: %s", ex.what());
351  }
352  }
353 
354  void PlaybackActionServer::change() {
355  if (_plan_index == _planner.response.joint_trajectory[0].points.size()) {
356  _loop = ros::Rate(_rate);
357  _state = Moving;
358  //ROS_ERROR("Mas será possível...");
359  return;
360  }
361  SSCMoveList command;
362  command.list.reserve(32);
363  double position;
364  ROS_WARN("Executing planning");
365  //_loop = ros::Rate(_planner.response.joint_trajectory[0].points[_plan_index].time_from_start);
366  for (auto it = _planner.response.joint_trajectory.begin();
367  it != _planner.response.joint_trajectory.end(); ++it) {
368  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint &trajectory = it->points[_plan_index];
369 
370  std::vector<std::string> &names = it->joint_names;
371 
372  for (int i = 0, size = names.size(); i < size; ++i) {
373  SSCMove move;
374  const std::string &name = names[i];
375  auto it = std::find_if(_aux_vec.begin(), _aux_vec.end(),
376  [name](const auxiliar_calibration &x) {
377  return name == x.joint_name;
378  });
379  position = trajectory.positions[it - _aux_vec.begin()];
380 
381  move.channel = it->ssc_pin;
382  move.pulse = (uint16_t) ((position - it->joint_lower) * (it->ssc_max - it->ssc_min)
383  / (it->joint_upper - it->joint_lower) + it->ssc_min);
384  if (move.pulse > it->ssc_max) {
385  ROS_WARN("Pulse overflow: %d", int(move.pulse));
386  move.pulse = it->ssc_max;
387  } else if (move.pulse < it->ssc_min) {
388  ROS_WARN("Pulse underflow: %d", int(move.pulse));
389  move.pulse = it->ssc_min;
390  }
391  move.speed = 0;
392  command.list.emplace_back(move);
393 
394  _joint_state.position[i] = position;
395  }
396  }
397  command.time = 0;
398  //const ros::Duration &delta = _planner.response.joint_trajectory[0].points[_plan_index].time_from_start;
399  //ROS_INFO("Delta T de: %f", delta.toSec());
400 
401  //_loop = ros::Rate(delta - _last_delta);
402  //_last_delta = delta;
403 
404  _ssc.publish(command);
405  _joints.publish(_joint_state);
406 
407  _feedback.percentage = _plan_index / _planner.response.joint_trajectory[0].points.size();
408  _feedback.movement_index = (_movement_index << 1) | 1;
409  _server.publishFeedback(_feedback);
410 
411  _plan_index++;
412  _loop.sleep();
413  }
414 
415  void PlaybackActionServer::onGoal() {
416  if (_step_it != _end_it) {
417  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
418  }
419  auto goal = _server.acceptNewGoal();
420  _movement_files = std::move(goal->filenames);
421  //_direct = goal->direct;
422  _movement_index = 0;
423 
424  try {
425  loadFile();
426  } catch (YAML::BadFile) {
427  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::BadFile);
428  _server.setAborted(_result);
429  ROS_FATAL("ERROR OPENING FILE");
430  }
431 
432  _state = Moving;
433  _loop = ros::Rate(100);
434  ROS_INFO("New Goal!");
435  }
436 
437  void PlaybackActionServer::onPreempt() {
438  _ssc.publish(SSCMoveList());
439  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::OK);
440  _server.setAborted(_result);
441  }
442 
443  void PlaybackActionServer::calibrate(int arduino_pin, int arduino_min, int arduino_max, int ssc_min,
444  int ssc_max, int ssc_pin, const std::string &joint_name,
445  double joint_lower, double joint_upper) {
446  _aux_vec[arduino_pin] = std::move(auxiliar_calibration{
447  arduino_min,
448  arduino_max,
449  ssc_min,
450  ssc_max,
451  ssc_pin,
452  joint_name,
453  joint_lower,
454  joint_upper,
455  });
456  _joint_state.name[arduino_pin] = joint_name;
457  ROS_INFO("Created joint %s", joint_name.c_str());
458  }
459 
460  void PlaybackActionServer::endCalibrate(double rate) {
461  _rate = rate;
462  _loop = ros::Rate(rate);
463  while (_aux_vec.back().arduino_max == 0)
464  _aux_vec.pop_back();
465  while (_joint_state.name.back().empty()) {
466  _joint_state.name.pop_back();
467  _joint_state.position.pop_back();
468  }
469  _planner.request.initial_positions.reserve(_aux_vec.size());
470  _planner.request.final_positions.reserve(_aux_vec.size());
471  }
472 
473 }
474 
478 int main (int argc, char *argv[]) {
479 
480  ros::init(argc, argv, "playback_action");
481  ros::start();
482 
483  ros::Rate loop(1000);
484  while (!ros::param::has("/pumpkin/config") && ros::ok()) {
485  loop.sleep();
486  }
487 
488  if (!ros::ok()) {
489  ros::shutdown();
490  return -1;
491  }
492 
493  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue config;
494  ros::param::get("/pumpkin/config", config);
495 
496  urdf::Model pumpkinModel;
497  std::string model_name;
498 
499  if (!ros::param::get("/pumpkin/description_file", model_name)) {
500  ROS_FATAL("Could not get model name");
501  ros::shutdown();
502  return -1;
503  }
504 
505  pumpkinModel.initFile(model_name);
506 
507  pumpkin::PlaybackActionServer server;
508 
509  /*
510  * Create calibration changes
511  * CAUTION!!!
512  * If the config doesn't have the same parts, in arduino and in ssc, we may have problems here.
513  */
514  auto joints = pumpkinModel.joints_;
515  for (auto it = config["arduino"].begin(), end_it = config["arduino"].end(); it != end_it; ++it) {
516  for (auto part_it = it->second.begin(), part_end_it = it->second.end(); part_it != part_end_it; ++part_it) {
517  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue & ssc_ref = config["ssc"][it->first][part_it->first];
518  std::string joint_name = (it->first)[0] + ("_" + part_it->first);
519  server.calibrate(int(part_it->second["pin"]),
520  int(part_it->second["analog_read_min"]),
521  int(part_it->second["analog_read_max"]),
522  int(ssc_ref["pulse_min"]),
523  int(ssc_ref["pulse_max"]),
524  int(ssc_ref["pin"]),
525  joint_name,
526  joints[joint_name]->limits->lower,
527  joints[joint_name]->limits->upper);
528  }
529  }
530 
531  ROS_INFO("Adjustments calculated.");
532 
533  double ros_rate = double(config["ros_rate"]);
534  //loop = ros::Rate(ros_rate);
535  server.endCalibrate(ros_rate);
536 
537  while (ros::ok()) {
538  ros::spinOnce();
539  server.step();
540  //loop.sleep();
541  }
542 
543  ros::shutdown();
544  return 0;
545 }
